item.title: A new blog
item.description: After years of battling WordPress hacks, rising costs, and home-lab hosting experiments, I’ve decided to reboot my blog with a new approach. Moving from dynamic sites to Hugo’s fast, static simplicity feels like the right balance of security, control, and creativity. A fresh start for sharing tech notes and learning.
